'''''SEVEN 32''''' is the thirty-second volume of the [[Marion E. Wade Center]]'s annual journal ''[[SEVEN]]'', published in [[2015]].<ref name="jstor" /> This issue celebrates the 50th anniversary of the Wade Center.<ref name="vii" >{{webcite|articleurl=https://journals.wheaton.edu/index.php/vii/article_index|articlename=Contents By Volume|website=[https://journals.wheaton.edu/index.php/vii/index VII: Journal of the Marion E. Wade Center]|accessed=13 August 2025}}</ref>
